item.description:
We will be at the Back room of Club Venue where its a more intimate setting..Lets meet there at 10:30 PM.

I know its kinda last minute but lets meet up tonight if you can make it.

Anyone Single/ Couples/ Lets hang out with old friends or make new ones.

Hang out with old friends or make new ones.

2 Dj's..music..tons of single and few different meetups.

If attending RSVP here or shoot email to highrollerboston@gmail.com with name and number of guests.

Cheers,
Ravi
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the Back room of Club Venue where its more intimate..I know its kinda last minute but lets meet up tonight if you can make it.
item.why: Hang out with old friends or make new ones.
item.name: Valentines Day Party..Singles/Couples Welcome
